title: Coming Up
description: Dear Dad,God, how to start?I'm not really a girl. I know I look like one, but it's all a horrible mistake.Every day I try to hide it, but I'm so tired. I don't want to hide it. I don't think I can much longer.So what I want, Dad, is a sex change. They won't let me have one until I go to counselling, but that's okay. I don't mind that. I've got nothing to lose.Dad, I've got a girlfriend. 'Cause I'm a boy. Only, she doesn't know.But, Dad. If I have the operation, she need never know.Dad, I love her. So much.
author: Al  Stewart
